title.label: Has potential but AI lacks a lot

content.label: This is a good game in core gameplay but the AI is the biggest problem. The players on offense don‚Äôt get pass when their teammates are open or when someone is close to tackling them. Another thing is the refereeing. Sometimes I get the ball only in a challenge but the ref calls a foul and the opposite happens too. This should be higher if the AI issues are fixed.
Enjoyable game.  Has its quirks but once you figure out what players strengths and weaknesses are, it‚Äôs quite the fun game.

I agree with all most of the 1 star rating, I just feel 2 stars is what it deserve, 3 stars at most for being generous. For having played 12,000 games, my advice is:
You need a certain mindset to play this game. Nothing makes sense, view it as a shaolin soccer game then you can deal with the fraustrations.

Be comfortable with exiting a match, relegations, and consecutive loses, playing against those with cheat formations and tactics, etc.

You can tell sometimes the match is predetermined that you win or lose. Everything you do right in the previous will go wrong in the next. You can win 7 consecutive matches and lose same.

Most annoying of all is the cheat formations and players. All the users do is cross and head. When you‚Äôre matched with them, 9 out of 10 every cross with end up at the back of your net. The Hammers, Bulldozers, Commanders, now Majors are OP on attack. Either use 3-5-2 or 5-3-2, go to the touchline, cross-head and win.

I don‚Äôt know much about the pay to win, but I won‚Äôt put it pass it. 

I‚Äôm pretty sure the developers are aware of the complaints and feedbacks, it‚Äôs either they‚Äôre okay with the game play or don‚Äôt know how to correct these issues.

Try not to take it personal and you can pass time with it. And I wouldn‚Äôt recommend spending on unless they change things.

I wish I could have more than one account going at the same time. (Well, I do, but it is a pain to switch between them..)

Love this game. Wish they made a hockey one as well!
This is probably the worst game in this App Store. Very buggy and can‚Äôt even control the players for the most part. Don‚Äôt even waste your time on a trash app like this

title.label: Was fun, Pay to win later

content.label: Pay to win trash that has almost no consistency in AI movement or penalty calling. If you should lose the game based on levels, you will. Not because the players stats are better but because AI assist just won‚Äôt allow you to have a chance at an upset, you‚Äôll be lucky to posses the ball longer than a few seconds. Save time and forfeit immediately.

This game is great for quick games and fun. But there‚Äôs literally nothing you can do to consistently win.  There will just be games when your players don‚Äôt make any runs or lose the ball because they hold onto it too much. Or sometimes the other team literally takes one touch every time and you can‚Äôt get near them to make a tackle. It seems completely arbitrary. Pretty much every player has the same winning percentage as a result.
You have 0 passing options and can‚Äôt score. The other team magically makes every pass perfectly and you can‚Äôt defend. Horrible game

So many matches are predetermined it‚Äôs ridiculous.  Can be a very fun game but at times you can totally outplay an opponent with better player and still lose due to absolutely ridiculous occurrences.  The only answer I arrive at is the matches are predetermined.  I gave also one matches were I have been totally outplayed yet due a terrible call or unearthly situation I score goals.  THIS NEEDS TO BE CORRECTED!!!

title.label: It‚Äôs got a soccer ball but it‚Äôs not soccer.

content.label:
Anyone that understands the beautiful game of f√∫tbol, when playing this app you‚Äôll see that the ideology of this app is not like f√∫tbol. You have the ball and you got someone far left who is wide open where you can pass and gain yards. Instead it gives you the options where you can only pass to your men who are well covered. You pass the ball and it gets stolen. Obviously!
Next problem I see is when your forward has the ball and he‚Äôs about 20 yards clear from the goalie and no one is on him nor any defenders in front of him, instead of getting closer to the goalie to score. It stops and tells you to pass to someone who‚Äôs covered. And further away to from the goalie. That‚Äôs when I knew this app was way too off.
& another problem is how all the players are just scattered around not playing in formation. There‚Äôs no idea or strategy in this game. It‚Äôs Basically just a pass and shoot game. I gave it a try for like 2 weeks but never got any better.
Best game soccer!

title.label: Great game, but needs better dribbling( and have dribbling stat)

content.label: I vigorously agree that this's one of the most wonderful and addictive game I've ever seen and played. However, the dribblers in this game are usually outweighed and overwhelmed compared to the defender. When my architect ( Ozil) had the ball and perform a dribble, he was easily tackled by the guard or explorer despite his high skill stat. And I think that this issue have to improve next times if this game wants to go higher. I suggest that base on the skill stat, players need to have dribbling stat and the dribbles need to be more efficient. All in all, the rating of this game is 4.5 because of the ineffective dribbling.

The game is manipulating. It‚Äôs not a fair game by any means. There‚Äôs far too many glitches, issues and with the AI. I initially started playing for the gameplay and the creativity revolving around your play, but once you start leveling up you begin to see the inconsistency and the realization of how wasteful it is to spend time on this app. NEVER PAY FOR ANYTHING, they are not worth the investment. I am very disappointed with the game.
This game is a stupid game please don‚Äôt waste your mb to download it

title.label: Please make event only for infinity players

content.label:
I think people from league infinity should have their own event and not be able to play other events. It‚Äôs super frustrating spending gems to play the event to then just be matched with 3 people from infinity league and have no chance to win. 
Please fix.
Thank you

The random AI controls the game so much more than you can control the game.  Your skill matters less as AI will decide which gamer to support more.  If you are on the side not supported, your players on the field all at a sudden become so dumb that you just can‚Äôt do anything about it. 

They are using gamer‚Äôs frustration as the main source of revenue.  Gamers will buy gems and stuff to build a stronger team, but will still be controlled by how the AI dictates.  This is a good game (Idea, mechanism, graphic, etc.) with a terrible monetization philosophy.

The game can be very addictive, but it always seems like you have the odds against you their defense always reacts faster than yours and also their midfields and forwards. On a rebound from a crossbar they always have players to tap the ball in.
